entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day

text: @realDonaldTrump @RussVought45 @USTreasury Vote by mail 101: Fill out ballot from your Covid-19 free home. Place in and seal provided envelope, sign affidavit. Place in mail box. Signature affidavit is verified on receiving end, ballot placed in secure lock box til election day. Invalid signature, toss the ballot.
